laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Cepheid nucleic acid amplification assay. Reference Range-Negative.

The liver, pancreas, spleen, and right adrenal gland are normal; left adrenal gland is absent due to renal agenesis. Right kidney is large (13 cm) with no lesions. Small fluid collection in the right paracolic gutter, and a new organized fluid collection in the posterior pelvis (4.8 x 2.3 x 1.8 cm). Postsurgical changes around the cecum.
